--------------------
Text: Side Effects is a 2005 romantic comedy about the pharmaceutical industry, directed by Kathleen Slattery-Moschkau and starring Katherine Heigl as Karly Hert, a pharmaceutical "detailer", who becomes disillusioned with the lack of ethics in the pharmaceutical industry and has tough choices to make.
Triplets:<Side Effects
2:
--------------------
Text: Side Effects (2005 film):  The film's title is a reference to the medical term "side effects".
